籤詩版本二:
Hamba uqonde e-Immortal Rock ukuze ufunde ukungafi. Uma lolu lwazi selumenyezelwe umbusi,
Isibhakabhaka esiluhlaza, ilanga nenyanga kuhlala kukhanya ngokukhazimulayo, futhi isithunzi senhliziyo elungile sisabalala emhlabeni wonke.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lokuthola isiqondiso kubantu abahloniphekile.
Konke kuhamba kahle ndawonye.
解曰: Kukhona isiqalo nesiphetho. Ungayi entshonalanga noma empumalanga. Sebenzisa inhliziyo yakho. Baningi abantu abayizicukuthwane.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Zhiyuan wahlubuka ebuthweni
U-Liu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) wayengowaseShatao (isizwe sakwaShatuo).
U-Liu Zhiyuan nomkakhe uLi Sanniang babehlala kwamalume wakhe. Umalume wakhe wasola ukuthi uLiu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) wayempofu, ngakho wanxenxa u-Zhiyuan ukuba aye engadini yamakhabe, enethemba lokuthi uLiu uzodliwa imimoya emibili yamakhabe. isibhamu ebusuku, salwa nemimoya yamakhabe, sangena ngaphansi komhlaba, samba inhlabathi, thola inkemba nencwadi yempi.
Wacosha inkemba yakhe kanye namakhono akhe ezempi, wavalelisa kumkakhe, wabe esejoyina ibutho, waphephela ku-Yue Xun futhi wasebenza njengesikhulu senxusa lokushweleza.
I-Khitan yabhubhisa i-Jin Dynasty, yashiya i-Central Plains ingenaye uchwepheshe. U-Zhiyuan waba umbusi eJinyang.
Izwe lashintshwa laba Obukhosi BakaHan Bamuva. Isabizwa ngokuthi i-Tianfu (igama lonyaka) ngaphandle kokushintsha inkathi.
聖意: Ikhaya liphephile, umuntu othanda ukuzenzela, imali yinhle, ibhizinisi lihle, umshado muhle, abashadile bashadile, umhambi wesilisa ubuyela ensimini, uhhafu wemibungu uyavunwa, izilwane eziyisithupha ziphumelele. , umuntu utholakele, icala liyaphumelela, ukufuduka kuhle, impahla elahlekile yinhle, isifo Anshan, ithuna lihle
